sentences.en: A partial wig or hairpiece worn to cover a bald spot.
sentences.cn: 假发戴在头上以遮盖秃发部位的部分假发或一绺假发.

sentences.en: All right , Joey. Be nice. So dose he have a hump, a hump and hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 打住, 乔伊. 嘴下留情. 他驼背?驼背又戴假发?

sentences.en: Ch : So does he have a hump A hump and a hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 那他是个驼背?驼背还戴假发?

sentences.en: Chandler: So does he have a hump? A hump and hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 额, 莫非 他是驼背? 又驼背又带假发?

sentences.en: Does he have a hump and hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 他驼背?既驼背又戴假发?

sentences.en: He has a hump and a hairpiece.
I need this hairpiece to give my hair some body.
sentences.cn: 我需要这顶假发来增加我头发的数量.

sentences.en: If Musa survives the coming weeks, and purchases a convincing hairpiece, he’ll be well placed to contract himself out to wobbling despots across the region.
sentences.cn: 如果穆萨能在未来的几个星期幸存下来，并购买一顶可以以假乱真的假发，以他的优势，在这个地区，胜任为摇摇欲坠的独裁者工作。

sentences.en: Later, when I wore the hairpiece for a play I was in, some friends of mine didn’t recognize me on stage.
sentences.cn: 后来，我又戴着假发去演了个戏剧，我的几个朋友甚至都认不出舞台上的是我。

sentences.en: She wore a new hairpiece every day and was considered a big wig.
sentences.cn: 她每天戴着新的假发,看起来像个大人物似的.

sentences.en: So does he a hump and a hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 他驼背?既驼背又带假发?

sentences.en: So does he have a hump and a hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 他既驼背又带假发(秃顶)?

sentences.en: So does he have a hump? A hump and hairpiece?
sentences.cn: 佢系米有驼背啊? 驼背兼带假发?

sentences.en: The hairpiece is not for sale.
sentences.cn: 林琳:店里的假发是不卖的啦!

sentences.en: The singer also a military - style jacket, ripped fishnets and a fan hairpiece a long veil.
sentences.cn: 她还穿着军服装样式外套, 剥去网罟,携带面纱,和球迷假发.

sentences.en: Wearing the hairpiece helped me realize the power of looks.
sentences.cn: 戴了假发，让我发现外表会起很大的作用。

trans.tran_en: a piece of false hair that you wear on your head to make your own hair look thicker
